titleStmt.title: Iuuenilia or Certaine paradoxes and problemes, written by I. Donne
titleStmt.author: Donne, John, 1572-1631.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E[lizabeth] P[urslowe] for Henry Seyle, and are to be sold at the signe of the Tygers head, in St. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
